text: Héctor J. Ferrer Ríos (March 27, 1966 – November 5, 2018) was a Puerto Rican Democratic politician and attorney. He was a legislator in the House of Representatives of Puerto Rico from 2001 to 2012 for three consecutive terms. He was the president of the Popular Democratic Party of Puerto Rico (PPD) from 2017 to October 2018. Ferrer was born in San Juan. In September 2015, Ferrer was diagnosed with esophageal cancer. He died in San Juan on November 5, 2018 from the disease at the age of 52. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from esophageal cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Puerto Rico Category:Puerto Rican politicians Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Puerto Rican lawyers
title: Héctor Ferrer
